Saint Peter is a figure known in the Christian faith as the gatekeeper of heaven. He is not believed to be living on Earth, but rather in heaven. 

Television is a technology that exists on Earth and requires physical presence to watch it. Therefore, it is not possible for Saint Peter to watch television as he is not on Earth. 

Thus, the answer to the question is (B) no.

First of all, Saint Peter is a religious figure who is believed to have lived over 2,000 years ago. Therefore, he could not have known about the existence of television, which was invented in the 20th century.

Additionally, as a Catholic saint, Saint Peter is believed to have ascended to heaven after his death. In heaven, he would not have any physical body and therefore would not have the ability to watch television. Therefore, the answer is (B) no.
